text: Can I include two dnd_area on the same page?
I’ll oftentimes do this on template that needs a static module – but a dnd area above and one below

Okay. This is what I've been trying to do, but when I view the page in the browser both dnd_area's contain the same content and only the first is editable in the page editor. I added two unique id's, maybe I am missing something else? I also tried stripping my page and just including the two dnd_area's without any html between, but seen the same result. Note this is within a dynamic page template if that changes anything?
post abbreviated code and I’ll take a look!
